name: Reforged Labs
headline: The world's first AI copilot built for mobile game marketers
description:
Reforged Labs empowers game studios to supercharge their performance marketing. Our AI copilot, the first platform built for mobile game marketing, enables UA managers to achieve results 5x faster and 10x cheaper.

By analyzing thousands of top-performing ads, our platform uncovers what makes an ad effective. Backed by real-world data, it transforms how UA managers brainstorm ideas, create video ads, and launch high-performing campaigns - delivering a competitive edge in the evolving gaming industry.

With Reforged Labs, you don’t just keep up with trends - you set them.
tags: industry:generative-ai; industry:b2b; industry:gaming; industry:advertising; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Robert Huynh, Founder
founders.description: Robert is the co-founder and CEO of Reforged Labs. Previously, he was at some of the world's largest tech companies (X the moonshot lab/Google/Microsoft) before starting his MBA at Harvard Business School.

# Meet BoaYour AI Copilot For Your Full Marketing Cycle
5.5xFaster decision and story onboarding
27%Average increase in ROAS
250+High-performing videos analyzed
30%Average increased CTR
![](https://reforgedlabs.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fai-inspiration-card.43d6d093.webp&w=3840&q=75)
![](https://reforgedlabs.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fad-analysis-card.313d05da.webp&w=3840&q=75)
![](https://reforgedlabs.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fautomated-storyboarding-card.ec69c273.webp&w=3840&q=75)
![](https://reforgedlabs.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fperformance-score-card.655adb48.webp&w=3840&q=75)
### Benefits
## Unlock your full marketing potential
![](https://reforgedlabs.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fup.1d7f666e.gif&w=1080&q=75)
### Boost your productivity
Eliminate long ad turnarounds and repetitive design feedback. Our AI lets you take ownership of your entire ad creative workflow, so you can do more, faster.
![](https://reforgedlabs.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fmagic.22106b9d.gif&w=1080&q=75)
### Experiment at scale
Test more ad concepts and variations to fine-tune your targeting, with the time and resources our AI saves you.
![](https://reforgedlabs.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fstrong.0423d2ce.gif&w=1080&q=75)
### Optimize with confidence
Get better performance with less intervention. Our AI is always learning from ad metrics to make creative changes that move the needle.
### testimonials
## The results tell the story, just like our customers do
“We’re excited about the future of GenAI and how it will transform the gaming industry. Working with Reforged Labs is like having our own team of AI scientists who can come up with innovative AI solutions to boost our core business metrics.”
Binh Nguyen
Lead Designer

generated_description:
**Reforged Labs: Revolutionizing Mobile Game Marketing with AI**

Founded in 2021 and a part of Y Combinator’s W22 batch, Reforged Labs is based in San Francisco and has a compact team of ten passionate individuals. Their mission is clear: **to create the world’s first AI copilot specifically designed for mobile game marketers**. Sounds ambitious? It is. But they’re making significant strides—enabling user acquisition (UA) managers to boost their marketing game five times faster and at a fraction of the cost.

At the heart of Reforged Labs is **Boa**, an AI-powered assistant that takes the grunt work out of ad creation. By analyzing thousands of successful ads, Boa helps UA managers brainstorm ideas, craft high-impact video ads, and launch campaigns that consistently perform better. This isn’t just about keeping up with industry trends; it’s about setting them and redefining the rules of the game. 

The stats are telling. Users of their platform report an impressive **27% average increase in return on ad spend (ROAS)** and a **30% bump in click-through rates (CTR)**. Meanwhile, the process of onboarding and making decisions is 5.5 times faster. With over 250 high-performing videos analyzed, the platform continuously learns and adapts, optimizing campaigns with minimal hands-on management.

Reforged Labs aims to show gaming studios that they not only *can* compete but *should* innovate boldly. As they put it, their technology "unlocks your full marketing potential." This kind of confidence drives a change that many marketers have awaited, while also making their operations increasingly efficient.

With the trend towards generative AI on the rise, partnering with Reforged Labs means you’re not just adopting a tool; you’re gaining an AI team that’s constantly evolving to meet your business needs. Not convinced? Their clients are speaking up, highlighting how the combination of creativity and AI is transforming their metrics and business outcomes.

If you’re intrigued or just want to see how it works, you can **[book a demo here](https://reforgedlabs.com/)</contact>**. Whether you’re a mobile game studio looking to enhance your marketing approach or simply interested in what the future holds for advertising in gaming, Reforged Labs is carving a notable path in this dynamic industry.

For more details, check out their website: [Reforged Labs](https://reforgedlabs.com/).
